channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Judge in Trump election case directs prosecutors to turn over info related to Pence documents probe
Shrinkflation hits 1 in 3 grocery items, including these common products
item.description: "Shrinkflation" — when companies charge the same for smaller sizes — is a sneaky way to raise prices. Read on to see what kind of products have shrunk...

item.title: Debt paid on historic hotel owned by family of West Virginia governor, a US Senate candidate
Election Day restrictions in Georgia raise red flags
item.description: Voters in the battleground state of Georgia are now facing more barriers to casting their ballot, but there are ways around them, experts warned.

item.title: Georgia prosecutor asks appeals court to reinstate 6 charges in Trump case
item.description: Lawyers for Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis said a judge "erred" when he dismissed the charges in March.

item.title: Trump was asked to name three nice things about Harris. His response sounded like hers
Fulton County DA asks court to reinstate several election charges against Trump

item.title: Gender wage gap widens for the first time in 20 years
item.description: Pay gap between men and women working full-time widened in 2023 for first time in 20 years, USCB data shows.

item.title: Jimmy Carter casts ballot in 2024 election
item.description: Former President Jimmy Carter has voted in the 2024 election, the Carter Center confirmed Wednesday.

item.title: Democrats' joint fundraising outpaces Republicans'

item.title: Big Lots to close another 56 locations in 27 states. Here's where.
item.description: Big Lots plans to shutter more stores as part of the Columbus, Ohio-based discount retailer's Chapter 11 bankruptcy process.
